name: com.nftygames.ugm
description: This is the SDK for Universal Game Models. If you are installing the Opsive integration, please note that you will need the UGM Example.

samples.description: Contains a lot of example use-cases for UGM
This is a sample for Opsive integration. Before Installing, please make sure you have imported Opsive from Assets Store and have been install the UGM Examples.
